item.title: I now work at Microsoft
item.description:
I now work at Microsoft where I am continuing as a Senior Software Engineering Manager, following itâ€™s acquisition of Xandr, Inc from AT&T

The acquistion was earlier announced in December 2021 after I had just started paternity leave. I am very excited at the outcome for me and my colleagues at Xandr following what seemed like a misadventure for several years at AT&T.

item.title: Changelog: 22/02/2022
item.description:
Summary

  • Add images to assets for upcoming posts
  • Update meta data in posts
  • Update permalinks for posts & archive pages
  • Update posts to use Jeykll new jekyll-picture-tag presets
  • Update blog layout and improve general UX.
  • Update homepage design to be more simplistic.
  • Update About page content
  • Update top-nav bar to highlight active menu navigation.

Pull Request

https://github.com/wintermuted/blog/pull/35

item.title: Changelog: 29/12/2021
item.description:
Summary

  • The Wiki was reorganized to include a main page and two initial hubs covering Cascadia & Software Engineering
  • Several new retroactive posts were added.
  • All articles containing images were migrated to using jekyll_picture_tag

All Changes

General Changes

  • The homepage status section was updated to indicate that I am currently on paternity leave.

Weblog

New Posts

  • Arch Cape Hike
  • Tillamook Forest Foraging
  • Whalen Island Camping Trip Sep 2020

Updated Posts

  • Bug Fixes
    • Changelog: 02-12-2021 - Correct the date format
  • Updates to article tags & migrate image tags to jekyll_picture_tag in the following posts:
    • Whalen Island Camping Trip June 2021
    • The Suttle Lodge
    • Ramona Falls Hike
    • Hamilton Mountain Hike
    • The Oregon Garden
    • Lunar New Year & the Oregon Coast
    • Experimenting with the Bullet Journal system
    • Pair programming at Jama Software

Wiki

New Articles

  • Cascadia Hub
  • Whalen Island - Tillamook, Oregon
  • Software Engineering Hub

Wiki Improvements

  • Breadcrumb navigation was added to the Wiki.
  • Links to articles are prefixed with an article icon.

Infrastructure Updates

  • Images are now embedded via the jekyll_picture_tag plugin
  • jekyll_admin was added as a dependency to provide a UI for managing the site.

item.title: Changelog: 02/12/2021
item.description:
Summary

  • Updates to the hosting setup for the website.
  • Improvements & Bug Fixes for Weblog Categories & Tags.

Infrastructure Changes

  • Change hosting from Github Pages to Netlify.
  • Domain changed from jamesonnyeholt.com to jnyeholt.dev.
  • SSL enabled.

Weblog

  • Migrate from jekyll-tagging to jekyll-archives.
  • Overhauled the Tags and Categories structure.
  • Fixed bug in the archive page where Jekyll frontmatter was being rendered on the Archive page.
  • Tagging now works in the deployed environment. Despite a lot of thrash attempting to get it to work with Github Pages, I ended up settling on moving hosting providers.

item.title: Changelog: 19/11/2021
item.description:
Summary

  • Improvements to the weblog layout and organization.
  • Some styling improvements.

Weblog

  • Weblogs category pages now have the same layouts.
  • The tag cloud on the Archive page now correctly links to individual tag pages. Tag Pages include a list of all posts
  • Weblog posts include tags at bottom of post page.
  • Mobile navigation button is now visible.

item.title: Changelog: 04/11/2021
item.description:
Summary

  • New retroactive weblog entries.
  • Wiki gets a new layout, and some new articles.

Weblog

  • Journal: I now work at Xandr, Inc.
  • Travelouge: Ramona Falls Hike
  • Travelogue: Hamilton Mountain

Wiki

  • New layout for the wiki in preparation for more content.
  • Article: Functional Programming
  • Article: Refactoring
  • Article: SOLID Software Design Principles

item.title: Fall Mushroom Foraging in the Oregon Coastal Range
item.description:
Every September for the past several years we have gone camping at Whalen Island on the Oregon Coast to celebrate Rachelâ€™s Birthday. This year we decided to cancel this trip due to inclement weather and the prospect of sleeping on the ground with Rachel heavily pregnant.

With the camping trip cancelled, Rachel decided she wanted to try to fit in one more mushroom foraging trip before the year was over with. We ended up exploring some areas we had tried in some prior years, and found quite a few things, though it was clear we were about a week or so too early.

Some of the mushrooms we found

  • Hypomyces lactifluorum (Wikipedia)
  • Marchantiophyta (Wikipedia)
  • Chantrelle (Wikipedia)
  • Nidulariaceae (Wikipedia)

item.title: Arch Cape, Washington Hike
item.description: Arch Cape is a hiking trail on the Washington side of the Columbia River Gorge.

item.title: Whalen Island Camping Summer '21
item.description:
We visited Whalen Island in June with some close friends. They were excited to give their new van a test drive and take their daughter on her first camping trip, while we wanted to catch some crab. Unfortunately, the tides did not work in our favor. Regardless, we had a great time.

Video

Photos

  • Whalen Island Camping Trip - Sep '20
  • Whalen Island Camping Trip - Sep '19
  • Whalen Island Camping Trip - Sep '18
